      • getKeyWriterNodeManagerQueryBean

        public static KeyWriterNodeManagerBean getKeyWriterNodeManagerQueryBean​(TransactionBox[] transactions)
        starting from an array of transactions the method generates a container with all the addresses involved to efficiently perform the bulk recovery of the financial statements and their subsequent updating. Punctual recovery from the filesystem is too expensive when over a thousand queries are exceeded. Furthermore the search space is potentially 2 ^ 256 addresses. This makes it impossible to use completely memory solutions.
        Parameters:
        transactions -
        Returns:

      • retriveNodeLinks

        public static ConcurrentSkipListMap<String,​NodeManagerBean> retriveNodeLinks​(KeyWriterNodeManagerBean nwB,
                                                                                   KeyWriterStatusBean kwSB)
        this function does not alter bean. Return a brand new list of beans from saved values the retrieve key is the hex format of the address. Returns a list of ALL the nodes linked to the given address
        Parameters:
        kwBB -
        kwSB -
        Returns:
